revision.text: {{Wired embedded system |brand=UP |model=Squared |revision=Duo Core 02/32 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=AAEON |manuf_model=UPS-APLC2F-A20-0232 |availability=Currently Shipping |price=98 |est_release_date=04/2017 |pcb_id=1907UPAP03 |type=single-board computer |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=4 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Intel Celeron |cpu1_model=N3360 |cpu1_cspeed=2.4 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=32 GiB |fla1_brand=SK Hynix |fla1_model=H26M64208EMR |fla2=16 |fla2_brand=Winbond |fla2_model=W25Q128FVSQ |ram1=2 GiB |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4F8E304HB-MGCJ |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, Mini PCIe, M.2, SATA 3.0 |expansion_minipcie_num=2 |expansion_usb_num=4 |expansion_sata_num=1 |serial=yes,, 10-pin header,, populated,, (115200 8N1) |eth_chip1_brand=Realtek |eth_chip1_model=RTL8111G |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8111G |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=2 |addl_chips=FPGA;Intel Altera;MAX10 10M02;;1;,,, PMIC for Intel Apollo Lake;TI;TPS65094;;1;,,, 64K I2C Serial EEPROM;Microchip;24LC64;;1;,,, 2 Differential Channel 2-to-1 Multiplexer/Demultiplexer Switch for PCIe;NXP;CBTL02042A;;1;,,, 30V Dual N-Channel MOSFET;Fairchild;FDMS7620S;;1;,,, 30V Dual N-Channel MOSFET;Fairchild;FDMC7200S;;1;,,, 30V P-Channel MOSFET;Fairchild;FDS6681Z;;1;,,, 30V P-Channel MOSFET;Fairchild;FDMC4435BZ;;3;,,, 3A 55V Boost Converter;MPS;MP3425;;1;,,, 10A 18V Synchronous Step-Down Converter;MPS;MP8762;;1; |flags=HDMI 1.4b, DisplayPort, eDP, LVDS, MIPI CSI, WoL, RTC w/ battery, I2C, I2S, SPI, ADC, UART, GPIO, heat sink |stock_boot=Grub;2.02;; |stock_os=Linux;4.10.0-9;Ubuntu 16.04 |tp_firmware=Android 7.1, Windows IoT Core |default_ip=acquired via DHCP |default_user=upsquared |default_pass=upsquared |oui_eth=00:07:32 }} {{TagLine|UP Squared Developer Board}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.aaeon.com/en/p/iot-gateway-maker-boards-up-squared}} [https://up-board.org/upsquared/specifications/ Sales Page] [https://github.com/up-board/up-community/wiki Community Wiki] "UP-ALP01 A1.0_0_0", "P/N 1907UPAP03" and "MADE IN TAIWAN" are silkscreened on board top near display ports. Provided as part of [https://www.seeedstudio.com/UP-Grove-IoT-Development-Kit-p-2994.html ''UPÂ² Grove IoT Development Kit''] ===Reviews=== *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2016/11/01/up-squared-apollo-lake-development-board-comes-with-up-to-8gb-ram-128-gb-storage-for-89-euros-and-up-crowdfunding/ ''UP Squared Apollo Lake Development Board'' on '''CNX-Software'''] *[https://linuxgizmos.com/sub-100-dollar-maker-board-packs-apollo-lake-4k-video-dual-gbe/ ''Sub-$100 maker board packs Apollo Lake SoC'' on '''LinuxGizmos'''] ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Intel Celeron]]'' Dual-Core (@2.4GHz) *Memory: 2GB LPDDR4 SDRAM *Storage: 16MB Serial Flash, :32GB eMMC 5.1, SATA 3 *Network: 2x Gigabit Ethernet *USB: 3x USB 3.0 ports, 1x USB 3.0 OTG port *Power: 5V, 4A via barrel ==Images== [[Has images::internal| ]] __NOTOC__
